title: 86 Year Old Charged With Murder 50 Years After Crime | True Crime Sunday
description:
Alabama man sentenced for strangling mother to death because he was upset she spent the inheritance

Former basketball player and N.J. high school star arrested for allegedly killing a woman in Mexico

86-year-old Wisconsin man sentenced to life for killing wife nearly 50 years ago
